mission: EPISODE 10: Dragon Calculus Olympics!! Show this as HUGE ANIMATED TITLE CARD at the beginning for 3 seconds with epic effects! Create a Family Guy Olympics special where dragons compete in calculus events. Cover chain rule, inverse function derivatives, higher derivatives, critical points, Fermat's theorem, Rolle's theorem, Lagrange mean value theorem, and Cauchy mean value theorem. Use visual metaphors: relay races, gymnastics, marathon running, treasure hunting. Make derivative rules and theorems exciting through Olympic competition format.

script_processing.original_script: [VISUAL: Epic animated title card: 'EPISODE 10: Dragon Calculus Olympics!!'] Welcome to the Dragon Calculus Olympics! Dragons compete in thrilling calculus challenges. [VISUAL: Dragons in a relay race for the chain rule.] They master the chain rule in a blazing relay race across treacherous terrains. [VISUAL: Dragons performing complex maneuvers for inverse functions.] Inverse function derivatives are judged in gravity-defying gymnastics routines. [VISUAL: Dragons climbing mountains for higher derivatives and critical points.] Higher derivatives and critical points are conquered in a marathon up a steep mountain. [VISUAL: Dragons treasure hunting for theorems.] Fermat's, Rolle's, Lagrange, and Cauchy theorems are found through epic treasure hunts!
script_processing.final_script: Welcome to the Dragon Calculus Olympics! Dragons compete in thrilling calculus challenges. They master the chain rule in a blazing relay race. Inverse function derivatives are judged in gravity-defying gymnastics. Higher derivatives and critical points are conquered in a mountain marathon. Fermat's, Rolle's, Lagrange, and Cauchy theorems are found in epic treasure hunts. Witness breathtaking aerial maneuvers and intense competition. Feel the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat. Cheering crowds roar their approval. The suspense is palpable. This is the ultimate test of mathematical prowess and athleticism. Dragons push their limits, soaring to new heights. The champions will be crowned
